Detailed Description

This interface is used to implement a visitor.

A visitor is an object that is used to visit each child of a directory watcher. It is part of the Watcher Module.

See also:
Watcher::visitChildren

virtual bool WatcherVisitor::visit ( Watcher::Mode  mode,
const std::string &  label,
const std::string &  valueStr 
) [inline, virtual]

virtual bool WatcherVisitor::visit ( Watcher::Mode  mode,
const std::string &  label,
const std::string &  desc,
const std::string &  valueStr 
) [pure virtual]

This method is called once for each child of a directory watcher when the visitChild member is called.

This function can return false to stop any further visits.

See also:
Watcher::visitChildren

Implemented in SumWV, WatcherPathRequestV1, DebugConsoleWatcherVisitor, and SelectWatcherVisitor.
